content.raw: Honestly, the packaging is completely trivial compared to the challenge of making it the native basis data structure. We could even just pull the Eigen headers into the `ign-math` repo if we wanted to make it literally 100% trivial, although I'd strongly prefer making it an external dependency, because that users can benefit from the latest revisions without us needing to keep our copy of Eigen's source tree up to date.
